source:
-- Get the total claims made and total cost of drugs in year 2017 in each geo of CA state

SELECT g.CityState, d.TotalClaimCount, d.TotalDrugCost, s.State
FROM details d
JOIN geography g ON (d.YearGeoKey = g.YearGeoKey)
JOIN states s ON (g.State = s.State)
WHERE s.state == 'CA' AND
      g.Year == '2017'
ORDER BY d.TotalDrugCost DESC

%%pyspark

# Get the top drugs in terms of cost across NY, CA, TX states administered in the years between 2014 and 2016

states_list = ['NY', 'CA', 'TX']
years_list = [2014, 2015, 2016]

geos_df = spark.table("geography")
drugs_df = spark.table("drugs")
details_df = spark.table("details")
details_df.join(drugs_df, details_df['YearDrugKey'] == drugs_df['YearDrugKey']) \
          .join(geos_df, geos_df['YearGeoKey'] == details_df['YearGeoKey']) \
          .where(geos_df['State' in states_list]) \
          .where(details_df['Year'] in years_list) \
          .select(drugs['DrugName'])
